mapper.select: select count(*) from( select subs.store_no,store_name,so_name,so_phone, count(report_no) as report_total_count from user_report join reservation using(reserve_no) join store subs on(reservation.store_no = subs.store_no) where report_type = 0 group by subs.store_no,store_name,so_name,so_phone order by store_no desc)

select * from (select rownum as rnum, report.* from( select subs.store_no as store_no,store_name,so_name,so_phone,store_addr, count(report_no) as report_total_count from user_report join reservation using(reserve_no) join store subs on(reservation.store_no = subs.store_no) where report_type = 0 group by subs.store_no,store_name,so_name,so_phone,store_addr order by store_no desc)report where report_total_count >4) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select report_no from user_report join reservation using(reserve_no) where reserve_no in (select reserve_no from reservation where store_no =#{storeNo})
mapper.update: update user_report set report_type=1 where report_no =#{reportNo}
